resources.string: Cartoon image of a lemon tree
Despite the hardships of weather and maintaining sustenance to feed its fruit and leaves, the tree remains standing throughout time and seasons to survive.
Cartoon image of a cup of lemonade
\"When life gives you lemons…\" symbolizes one of the most fundamental aspect to life: seeing opportunity in seemingly harsh, impassable, and sour situations.
Cartoon die with the 3 side faced up

The number "3" and the die represent the never-ending process of equilibrium. 3 is the number of balance, symbolizing the nothing, everything, and something in between. The die represent the natural chaos and order of the universe: when something seemingly random occurs, but sets a general path of what is to follow.
